title: # 325 - Jake Weisman, Matt Ingebretson, & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Jake Weisman and Matt Ingebretson, the creators of The Comedy Central show "Corporate". We talk about honesty in comedy, virginity, hecklers, how they started their show, dating in the work place, plans for the future, and much more!

"Corporate" premieres Jan 15th on Comedy Central at 10:30pm

This episode is brought to you by Withings. Visit www.Withings.com/bertcast for 30% off, and get on the road to better health. 

This episode is also brought to you by Robinhood. Buy and sell stocks with the Robinhood app. Right now Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock like Apple, Ford, or Sprint to help build your portfolio. Go to www.Bertcast.robinhood.com and sign up today.

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $5 go to www.forhims.com/bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Squarespace. Use the offer code "Bertcast" for 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain. 

This episode is also brought to you by Noom. Start your trial today and start losing weight for good at www.noom.com/bertcast 

Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!
For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
